H0.text: Julie Pankhurst made a fortune creating which website. MySpace

H1.text: Julie Pankhurst made a fortune creating which website. LinkedIn

H2.text: Julie Pankhurst made a fortune creating which website. Facebook

H3.text: Julie Pankhurst made a fortune creating which website. Friendsreunited

A4.text: The website was conceived by Julie and Steve Pankhurst of Barnet, Hertfordshire and their friend Jason Porter in 1999.

A5.text: Friends Reunited was bought by ITV plc for £120 million ($208 million), plus further payments of up to £55 million based on its performance up to 2009.
